directions: Combine chocolate, 1 tablespoon milk, and butter or margarine in a medium, microwave safe  bowl.  Microwave on high for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds.  Stir until chocolate is completely melted. Spread evenly in pie crust.
Pour 1 1/2 cups milk into a large bowl. Add pudding mix, and beat with wire whisk for 2 minutes. Stir in 1 1/2 cups coconut. Spoon over banana slices in crust.
Spread whipped topping over pie.  Sprinkle with toasted coconut.  Refrigerate 4 hours, or until set. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) deep dish pie crust, baked and cooled
1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 ½ cups frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Chocolate Banana Cream Pie
